C

calculatePercentGrade(double, int) - Static method in class calculations.GradeCalculations
The calculatePercentGrade method takes in the sum of the percent values earned in every assignment of a class with a basic percents grading method and divides it by the total number of assignments to get the average grade.
calculatePointsGrade(double, int) - Static method in class calculations.GradeCalculations
The calculatePointsGrade method takes in the sum of the points earned from every assignment in a class with a points grading method and divides it by the total number of assignments to get the average grade.
calculateWeightGrade(ArrayList<Double>, ArrayList<Integer>) - Static method in class calculations.GradeCalculations
The calculateWeightGrade method takes in a list of grades of assignments from every assignment category and uses the weight percents to determine the average grade.

The changePassword method uses the refactorUser method to change the password of a user.

The clearText method clears all the text from the fields.
